snippet.title: Bearbushkas - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Добро пожаловат!

Bearbushkas is the ultimate 4 player multiplayer mayhem for your iPad. Destroy your fellow Bearonauts in fierce space battles!

Features:
- Play against up to 4 players on one iPad or practice against the computer.
- Colorful, handdrawn cartoon-graphics
- Choose from multiple awesome Bearonauts, each one with his own unique spaceship!
- Shoot your enemies or use powerful items to destroy them!
- Battle in 3 different levels with special features such as lasers or asteroids.

Download on the App Store: https://itunes.apple.com/app/id967023931

http://www.bearbushkas.com/

https://www.facebook.com/bearbushkas/
